meanings.definition: To make something greater by adding to it
meanings.sent1: She augmented her savings by depositing a portion of her paycheck every month.
meanings.sent2: The chef augmented the flavor of the soup by adding fresh herbs.
meanings.sent3: The magician augmented his performance by incorporating a new trick.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness augmented the warmth of the room like a cozy blanket.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight augmented the beauty of the garden, making the flowers appear more vibrant.

meanings.definition: To increase in size or amount
meanings.sent1: The company augmented its workforce to meet the growing demand for their products.
meanings.sent2: The rain augmented the water level in the river, causing it to overflow.
meanings.sent3: The laughter in the room augmented as more people joined the party.
meanings.sent4: His excitement augmented with each step he took towards his dream.
meanings.sent5: The music augmented in intensity, filling the room with energy.

meanings.definition: Having been made greater in size or value
meanings.sent1: The augmented reality game provided a unique gaming experience.
meanings.sent2: The painting featured augmented colors that made it stand out in the gallery.
meanings.sent3: The cake had an augmented layer of frosting that delighted the guests.
meanings.sent4: Her augmented collection of vintage coins was the envy of collectors.
meanings.sent5: The augmented price of the house reflected its luxurious upgrades.
